title: 92/518/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 November 1992 amending Commission Decisions 92/460/EEC, 92/461/EEC, 92/462/EEC and 93/463/EEC concerning the animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the import of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine species from Switzerland, Sweden, Finland and Iceland
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 3 November 1992
amending  Commission Decisions 92/460/EEC, 92/461/EEC, 92/462/EEC and 93/463/EEC concerning the animal health  conditions and veterinary certificates for the import of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine  species from Switzerland, Sweden, Finland and Iceland
(92/518/EEC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The text of Article 4 of Decisions  92/460/EEC, 92/461/EEC, 92/462/EEC and 92/463/EEC is replaced by the following:
'Article 4
The present Decision shall apply from the 9 November 1992.`
This Decision  is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 November 1992. For the  Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
